Hello World

About Me

My name is Frank Ji, and I live in the heart of the city of Toronto. I am a software developer currently working at IBM Canada. My team builds one of the key infrastructures of almost all the major banks and financial institutions in Canada. In that sense, I feel good about the fact that my work impacted millions of users.
In my leisure time, I am pursuing a long list of interests to keep myself entertained. And I will be sharing some of the most exciting things I learned or encountered in my blog.

My Interests List

This are the 6 things I did the most in 2015

  • Hack something out
  • Travelling to other cities
  • Playing games on a PC
  • Finding the secret menu
  • Stocks and Trading
  • Reading an actual book
